rows.label: qev092405_MSG0001
rows.name:
Wait, how canâ€”
This database contains my father's journal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0002
rows.name:
Was this why we came all the way out here?
Why everyone was involved?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Hope you did it to pay her back,
and hand the journal over.

rows.label: qev092405_SEL0021
rows.name: Yell "Surprise!" and give Hope a big smile.

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0003
rows.name:
But you've already given me so much!
It's me who should be repaying you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh, my goodness... I'm so happy right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0005_2
rows.name: I'll read this on my own later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm sure he'll have a solution for all the
unintended hurt I've caused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092405_MSG0007
rows.name: And for how to avoid another Ornella...[ST:wait ]
